name: Taking Flight Lariat Necklace
description:
Be Free... with this super unique art necklace.

The flying bird drops gracefully from the tree from a sterling silver chain. Lariat style, you can adjust the distance that the bird hangs from the tree.

Hand cut and finished "sculpture" in aged copper.

18" hang length with extra chain for the bird to hang from.

I recommend wrapping the bird around twice to keep it in place and secure.
